phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, Licht.
Asta was no match for his overwhelming magical powers.
The one who came to Asta's rescue
was none other than the captain of the Black Bulls, Yami Sukehiro.
In a breathless battle between light magic and dark magic,
Asta went beyond his limits and closed in for his counterattack.
I cannot allow people like you to harm my comrades
Light Creation Magic: Light Whip of Judgment!
I held back most of my magic,
but it is all really too fragile...
Both this world and you fools.
If you felt like it, Master Licht, the Magic Knights would be no more than infants!
If you concentrate like that, you can sense the ki of natural objects, too.
That way, you will never get killed by stuff like falling rocks.
Who do you think you are?
Now take it up a notch and go after the white-haired dude with the round eyebrows!
Actually, I think I could do that right now.
Because of my ki, I am enthusiastic, energetic, and confident!
Hope you are ready, Round Brows!
I told him that I would show him the power of a captain, so I will do it.
Plus, if you did it, you would die.
But then what am I supposed to do with all this extra energy?!
You can tackle that scrawny line-faced dude.
It is been a while since I have let loose.
My magic is being drawn in.
So this is the power of dark magic.
Now that I know that, it will be impossible for you to get me.
Hey, you were in the middle of some weird story,
but that was not the end of it, was it?
That grimoire means you are a citizen of the Clover Kingdom, right?
He left himself wide open so I would let my guard down...
What is your real goal here?
Since you are a foreigner, I am sure you have noticed them, too.
Some are on the brink of death from starvation,
but others have so much excess food that they throw it away.
People are ranked by how much or how little magic they have,
but some have great magic, yet are discriminated against for reasons of birth.
Some are hurt in the name of justice because they were born in another country.
We were born from these distortions...
I am not seeing the point here.
Are not you trying to do the same thing these distorted people do?
Let me answer your sins with sin.
So you are going to have it your way, no matter what.
I do not have any magic.
Can I surpass them, even if I train?
This guy, Yuno, and the Wizard King...
To think that he has enough power to go head to head with Master Licht...
Please allow me to assist you!
Why are you wimping out, you dumbass?
I left that scrawny guy to you.
I do not give guys jobs they cannot do.
Do something about him in your own way.
I am going to become the Wizard King, no matter what.
I do not have time to get depressed.
All right, let us do this!
First, I will become the guy who beats you!
You will not get me twice.
You may be able to see what is coming, but can you block all of these?
You dared defy Master Licht despite having no magic.
You will pay with your life!
I do not think I am going to last until he runs out of magic.
Even if I manage to repel his attacks, at this rate, he is going to beat me.
You threw away your only weapons?
In that case, I will take you out with an extra-big one!
You just punched him in the face!
You let your guard down again.
It is probably within five meters.
but to think there was a magic
that could absorb my own magic and stop me from moving...
The one attribute that is the natural enemy of my light magic.
However, dark magic is extremely slow.
Light has absolute speed, making them polar opposites there, as well.
That is why you cloaked your weapon in darkness
and created a combat style that uses reinforcement magic to compensate.
Why does it sound like he is bragging?!
By the way, what is up?
You can use recovery magic, cannot you?
But while you are healing yourself, I am going to get real close
and chop you up even more.
You are the second person I have met with the power to defeat me.
But I sadly cannot waste my time with you.
I still have an ultimate enemy left who inflicted this unhealable wound on me,
This is currently my greatest magic.
A spell with such a wide range and high output that pulling it in
with that spell you used will not do any good.
You will meet your end the moment I release this, Captain of the Black Bulls.
You will also be punished for hurting Valtos, and return that grimoire.
That is definitely a four-leaf for you...
His magical abilities are off the charts.
Unless I catch him by surprise, he will just dodge any slash at light speed.
I will leave that up to the me of five seconds from now!
Do not you dare die, you old hag!
You are supposed to be some immortal monster hag!
Gauche, you are hurt really badly, too, so you should worry about your own
Uh... I am the one with seniority here, you know!
Gauche's treatments will be done soon.
Well, all of his wounds just barely missed his vital points.
Then hurry up and treat the old hag, not me!
You are going to save them, are not you?
I am counting on you, Gauche.
Marie's going to be sad, damn it!
I am a monster hag, remember?
I will not kick the bucket so easily.
Relax and get over there, you sister complex freak.
I am very sorry for being violent toward your sister.
I would not be of any help if I went.
Everyone lives by supporting each other.
You just protect what you want to protect.
Someday, that will help somebody out.
I know what I have to do now.
Take me back to that cave!
And I am your senior, damn it!
Actually, even if we go back,
are you going to be able to do anything about that blinding magic guy?
You did not stand a chance earlier,
so it is probably better to wait for reinforcements.
We will not be able to surprise attack him with my spatial magic.
People with powerful magic have force fields of magic that appear around them.
I will not be able to get that close.
Not to mention, I moved way too many people really far today.
I may only be able to use my magic one more time.
I have gone into defensive mode, but...
He is going to kill us.
The swords will probably be all that is left of you.
Not give up until the end?
Now you are just trying to act cool!
To be completely honest, there is nothing we can do right now.
Grit your teeth and stand firm.
That is all we can do right now.
Did we come to the wrong place?
This has gotten way out of hand!
Light Magic: Ray of Divine Punishment.
No matter how big or strong it is...
To think someone could wound Sally this badly.
This is annoying, but it looks like it is our turn.
It was pretty cold in the cave!
Yeah, my throat's just a little sore.
M-My angel Marie's voice sounds like Captain Yami's!
More importantly, Brother, go save Asta and the others!
The old hag's voice is weird, too?
I may only be able to use my magic one more time.
Your big brother defeated the enemy!
I need to hurry back to Marie...
Who the hell are you guys?
No one said anything about reinforcements!
I might not be able to go back just yet, Marie.
